The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring

wikitext.*:
[[Image:Vivendi Universal Games-Logo.png|thumb|175px|right|Vivendi logo]]
'''Vivendi''' is a French media conglomerate, owner of [[Sierra Entertainment]] and for a short time also of [[Houghton Mifflin]]. The former branch concerned with interactive multimedia, '''Vivendi Games''', published several [[:Category:games|video games]] on the license of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit]]'', before the book rights went to [[Electronic Arts]]: 
* [[2002]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
* [[2003]]: ''[[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|The Hobbit]]''
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]''
In 2008, Vivendi Games was merged with Activision, to create Activision Blizzard.
